Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 570 Filed 01/05/22 Page 3 of 3
The Honorable Alison J. Nathan
January 5, 2022
Page 3
sooner than one month from now. Ms. Maxwell also suggests that all the deliberating jurors will need to be examined, not to impeach the verdict, but to evaluate the Juror's conduct.
Ms. Maxwell is drafting a Rule 33 motion to be filed on a schedule ordered by the Court.
s/ Jeffrey S. Pagliuca
Jeffrey S. Pagliuca
Laura A. Menninger
HADDON, MORGAN & FOREMAN P.C.

Denver, CO 80203
